comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Read All About It - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/page/1529917 " Children's Tableau Earlier, 15,000 schoolchildren from 238 schools all over the Riverina and across the Victorian border excitedly greeted the Queen in Bolton Park. In the centre were 2,000 Wagga children, wearing red, white and blue crepe paper hats and tunics, with coloured "wavers" on their wrists, forming a huge Union Jack. ... "

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: The Queen seems to have arrived and departed Wagga Wagga by aircraft, not the train. trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/18409753
